column5: We have a large house with 3 bedrooms with 3 Full bath just waiting for you. This is listing for 1 Bedroom with 1 Queen Bed. This also comes with one private restroom with full bath.  Our house is very open, spacious and very clean. You will be sharing the house with us (We are downstairs). All 3 rooms are upstairs.  Our Rates per night are very affordable. We encourage our guests to send us a message introducing you and your companion and your plans during your stay.
column8: Cozy House 1 room 1 Bath with Game/Media Room R2
